reviews_details.review: 나중에 더 발전한 버전이 나오겠지만 일단 현재까지는 이 버전이 개인적으로 개추!

Найбільш реалістичний та захоплюючий футбольний менеджер, навіть якщо і поріг входу достатньо великий.

[i]Оцінка: [b]8,5[/b][/i]

The player movements are beyond frustrating, and it seems like the AI can score at will, no matter what you try. And don't get me started on those one-on-one situations with the keeper—your player just gifts the ball to them every single time!

Seriously, this match engine is a joke. Same old conversations, and the options to click are just mind-numbingly dull. It's like the dumbest game I've seen in ages.
